NativeVocService.queried: (voc.code like :query or voc.name like :query)
(voc.code like :query or voc.name like :query)

NativeVocService.join: left join WorkFunction as wf on wf.id= e.person_id left join Worker as w on w.id=wf.worker_id left join Patient as p on p.id=w.person_id left join VocWorkFunction vwf on vwf.id=wf.workFunction_id left join department d on d.id=e.department_id left join mislpu m on m.id=d.department_id
NativeVocService.queryAppend: wf.dtype='PersonalWorkFunction' and (wf.archival is null or wf.archival='0')
NativeVocService.queried: voc.name like :querInd or voc.code like

NativeVocService.join: left join Worker as w on w.id=wf.worker_id left join Patient as p on p.id=w.person_id left join VocWorkFunction vwf on vwf.id=wf.workFunction_id
NativeVocService.queryAppend: wf.dtype='PersonalWorkFunction' and (wf.archival is null or wf.archival='0')
NativeVocService.queried: (cast(wf.id as varchar(20))= :querInd or vwf.name like UPPER(:quer1) or p.lastname like UPPER(:quer1) or (p.lastname like UPPER(:quer1) and (UPPER(:quer2) is null or p.firstname like UPPER(:quer2)) and (UPPER(:quer3) is null or p.middlename like UPPER(:quer3))) )

NativeVocService.join: left join mislpu m on m.id = d.department_id left join vocbuildinglevel vbl on vbl.id = d.buildinglevel_id left join vocbuilding vb on vb.id = d.building_id
NativeVocService.queried: (cast(d.id as varchar(20))= :querInd or m.name like :quer1 or vbl.name like :quer1 or vb.name like :quer1)
(cast(m.id as varchar(20)) = :querInd or m.name like UPPER(:query))
(cast(vwf.id as varchar(20)) = :querInd or vwf.name like UPPER(:query))

left join patient pat on pat.id=uv.person_id

NativeVocService.join: left join medicalequipmentposition mep on mep.equipmenttype_id=vte.id left join medicalstandard ms on ms.id=mep.standard_id left join mislpu ml on ml.medicalstandard_id=ms.id
NativeVocService.queried: upper(vte.name) like upper(:querId)

NativeVocService.join: left join assessmentcardtemplate act on act.id = ass.assessmentcard

NativeVocService.names: ca.accountNumber||' '||CASE WHEN cp.dtype='NaturalPerson' THEN 'Физ.лицо: ' ||p.lastname ||' '|| p.firstname|| ' '|| p.middlename||' г.р. '|| to_char(p.birthday,'DD.MM.YYYY') when cp.dtype='JuridicalPerson' then coalesce(vjp.name||' ','')||case when reg.id is not null then 'Страх.комп. ' when lpu.id is not null then 'ЛПУ ' when vjp.code='SILOVIK' then 'Сил. стр-ра:' else 'Юрид.лицо: ' end ||cp.name END
NativeVocService.join: left join MedContract mc on mc.id=ca.contract_id left join contractperson cp on cp.id=mc.Customer_id left join patient p on p.id=cp.patient_id left join VocJuridicalPerson vjp on vjp.id=cp.juridicalPersonType_id left join MisLpu lpu on lpu.id=cp.lpu_id left join REG_IC reg on reg.id=cp.regCompany_id
NativeVocService.queried: upper(ca.accountNumber) like upper(:querId)
NativeVocService.queryAppend: cp.dtype='JuridicalPerson' and (ca.isFinished='0' or ca.isFinished is null)

NativeVocService.join: left join workfunction wf on wf.secuser_id=suu.id left join workfunction allwf on allwf.group_id=wf.group_id left join worker w on w.id=allwf.worker_id left join worker allw on allw.person_id=w.person_id left join workfunction aallwf on aallwf.worker_id=allw.id left join secuser su on su.id=aallwf.secuser_id left join patient pat on pat.id=allw.person_id
NativeVocService.queried: upper(pat.lastname) like upper(:querId) or upper(su.login) like upper(:query)
NativeVocService.queryAppend: su.id is not null and (su.disable is null or su.disable='0') and (su.disabled is null or su.disabled='0') and (aallwf.archival is null or aallwf.archival='0')

NativeVocService.queried: upper(vudg.name) like upper(:querId)

NativeVocService.queried: upper(pat.lastname) like upper(:querId) or upper(su.login) like upper(:query)
cast(vct.id as varchar(2)) like :querId or upper(vct.name) like upper(:query)

left join VocServiceType vst on vst.id=ms.serviceType_id

NativeVocService.join: left join VocServiceType vst on vst.id=ms.serviceType_id
NativeVocService.queried: upper(ms.name) like upper(:query) or upper(ms.code) like upper(:query)

NativeVocService.names: case when wf.dtype='GroupWorkFunction' then vwf.name||' '||wf.groupname else vwf.name||' '|| p.lastname||' '||p.firstname||' '||p.middlename end ||' ' || case when wf.dtype='PersonalWorkFunction' then ml2.name else ml1.name end
NativeVocService.queried: (cast(wf.id as varchar(20))= :querInd or vwf.name like UPPER(:quer1) or wf.groupname like UPPER(:quer1) or p.lastname like :quer1 or (p.lastname like :quer1 and (:quer2 is null or p.firstname like :quer2) and (:quer3 is null or p.middlename like :quer3)) )
NativeVocService.queryAppend: (wf.dtype='PersonalWorkFunction' and wf.group_id is null or wf.dtype='GroupWorkFunction') and (wf.archival is null or wf.archival='0')
NativeVocService.join:
left join Worker as w on w.id=wf.worker_id left join MisLpu ml1 on ml1.id=wf.lpu_id left join MisLpu ml2 on ml2.id=w.lpu_id
left join Patient as p on p.id=w.person_id left join VocWorkFunction vwf on vwf.id=wf.workFunction_id

NativeVocService.queryAppend: current_date >= pl.datefrom and (pl.dateto is null or pl.dateto >= current_date)
NativeVocService.queried: upper(pl.name) like upper(:query)

NativeVocService.join: left join privilege p on p.person_id=cp.patient_id and (p.enddate >= current_date or p.enddate is null) or p.person_id is null left join vocprivilegecategory vpc on vpc.id = p.category_id
NativeVocService.names: max(case when p.serialdoc is null and p.category_id is null then p.numberdoc else p.serialdoc||' '||p.numberdoc||' ('||vpc.name||')' end)
NativeVocService.queried: upper(p.numberdoc) like upper(:query)

NativeVocService.queryAppend: (ved.isArchival is null or ved.isArchival='0') and (ved.isComission is null or ved.isComission='0')
NativeVocService.queried: upper(ved.name) like upper(:query)
upper(ved.name) like upper(:query)
upper(ved.name) like upper(:query)

NativeVocService.queryAppend: wf.dtype = 'PersonalWorkFunction' and (archival is null or archival='0') and vlf.code in ('2','4','5')
NativeVocService.join: left join VocWorkFunction as vwf on vwf.id=wf.workFunction_id left join Worker as w on w.id=wf.worker_id left join Patient as p on p.id=w.person_id left join VocExtDispServiceFunction vedsf on vedsf.code=vwf.code left join MisLpu ml on ml.id=w.lpu_id left join VocLpuFunction vlf on vlf.id=ml.lpuFunction_id
NativeVocService.queried: upper(p.lastname) like upper(:query)

NativeVocService.queried: upper(vma.code) like upper(:query)

NativeVocService.parent: wf.id = :par1 and 1=(select count(vss.id) from vocServiceStream vss where vss.id=:par2 and ( (vss.isCalcOmcHosp='1' and (ms.isNoOmc is null or ms.isNoOmc='0')) or ((vss.isCalcOmcHosp is null or vss.isCalcOmcHosp='0') and pl.id is not null)))

NativeVocService.queried: upper(ms.name) like upper(:query) or upper(ms.code) like upper(:query)

NativeVocService.parent: wf.id = :par1 and 1=(select count(vss.id) from vocServiceStream vss where vss.id=:par2 and ( (vss.code in ('BUDGET','OBLIGATORYINSURANCE') and (ms.isNoOmc is null or ms.isNoOmc='0')) or (vss.code not in ('BUDGET','OBLIGATORYINSURANCE') and pl.id is not null)))

wcp.name like :query

NativeVocService.join: left join worker w on w.lpu_id=wcp.lpu_id left join workfunction wf1 on wf1.lpu_id=wcp.lpu_id and (wf1.DTYPE='GroupWorkFunction' or wf1.DTYPE='OperatingRoom') left join workcalendar wc1 on wc1.workfunction_id=wf1.id left join workfunction wf on wf.worker_id=w.id and wf.dtype='PersonalWorkFunction' left join workcalendar wc on wc.workfunction_id=wf.id

NativeVocService.queried: mp.id like :querId or (mp.series like $piece(:querId,' ',1)||'%' and (mp.polNumber like $piece(:querId,' ',2)||'%' or $piece(:querId,' ',2) is null)) or p.lastname like upper(:querId) or (p.lastname like $piece(upper(:querId),' ',1)||'%' and (p.firstname like $piece(upper(:querId),' ',2)||'%' or $piece(upper(:querId),' ',2) is null) and (p.middlename like $piece(upper(:querId),' ',3)||'%' or $piece(:querId,' ',3) is null))

NativeVocService.join: left join VocExpertConclusion vec on vec.code=vecs.conclusionCode
NativeVocService.queried: (cast(vecs.id as varchar(5)) like :querId or upper(vecs.name) like UPPER(:query))

NativeVocService.join: left join VocExpertType vet on vet.code=vecs.typeCode
NativeVocService.queried: (cast(vecs.id as varchar(5)) like :querId or upper(vecs.name) like UPPER(:query))

NativeVocService.join: left join VocExpertType vet on vet.code=vecs.typeCode

(cast(vecs.id as varchar(5)) like :querId or upper(vecs.name) like UPPER(:query))
mp.id like :querId or (to_char(cb.birthFinishDate,'DD.MM.YYYY') like $piece(:querId,' ',1)||'%'
cast(p.id as varchar(20)) = :querInd or p.lastname like :querId or (p.lastname like :quer1 and (:quer2 is null or p.firstname like :quer2) and (:quer3 is null or p.middlename like :quer3))

NativeVocService.names: CASE WHEN cp.dtype='NaturalPerson' THEN 'Физ.лицо: '||p.lastname ||' '|| p.firstname|| ' '|| p.middlename||' г.р. '|| to_char(p.birthday,'DD.MM.YYYY') when cp.dtype='JuridicalPerson' then 'Юрид.лицо: '||cp.name else '' END
NativeVocService.join: left join ContractPerson cp on cp.id=sp.person_id left join patient p on p.id=cp.patient_id
NativeVocService.queried: cast(sp.id as varchar(20)) like :querId or cp.name like upper(:query) or (p.lastname like :querId or (p.lastname like :quer1 and (:quer2 is null or p.firstname like :quer2) and (:quer3 is null or p.middlename like :quer3)))
(id like :query or name like UPPER(:query))

NativeVocService.names: CASE WHEN cp.dtype='NaturalPerson' THEN 'Физ.лицо: ' ||p.lastname ||' '|| p.firstname|| ' '|| p.middlename||' г.р. '|| to_char(p.birthday,'DD.MM.YYYY') when cp.dtype='JuridicalPerson' then coalesce(vjp.name||' ','')||case when reg.id is not null then 'Страх.комп. ' when lpu.id is not null then 'ЛПУ ' when vjp.code='SILOVIK' then 'Сил. стр-ра:' else 'Юрид.лицо: ' end ||cp.name END
NativeVocService.join: left join patient p on p.id=cp.patient_id left join VocJuridicalPerson vjp on vjp.id=cp.juridicalPersonType_id left join MisLpu lpu on lpu.id=cp.lpu_id left join REG_IC reg on reg.id=cp.regCompany_id
NativeVocService.queried: cast(cp.id as varchar(10)) like :querId or UPPER(cp.name) like :query or p.lastname like upper(:querId) or (p.lastname like upper(:quer1) and (p.firstname like upper(:quer2) or :quer2='%') and (p.middlename like upper(:quer3) or :quer3='%'))

NativeVocService.join: left join VocObjectPermission vop on vop.id=vp.object_id left join VocObjectPermission vop1 on vop1.code=vp.objectCode
NativeVocService.queried: (cast(vp.id as varchar(20)) like :querId or vp.name like UPPER(:query))
(cast(id as varchar(10)) like :query or upper(name) like UPPER(:query) or code like UPPER(:query) or replace(code,'.','') like UPPER(:query))
((cast(id as varchar(10)) like :query or name like UPPER(:query)) or (replace(upper(code),'.','') like (upper(:query))) or upper(name) like upper(:query) or upper(code) like upper(:query))
((cast(id as varchar(10)) like :query or name like UPPER(:query)) or (replace(upper(code),'.','') like (upper(:query))) or upper(name) like upper(:query) or upper(code) like upper(:query))

NativeVocService.parent: wf.id=:par1 and (ms.startDate is null or to_date(:par2,'dd.mm.yyyy') >=ms.startDate) and (ms.finishDate is null or ms.finishDate>=to_date(:par2,'dd.mm.yyyy')) and (wfs.lpu_id is null or wfs.lpu_id=coalesce(wf.lpu_id,w.lpu_id)) and (wfs.workfunction_id is null or wfs.workfunction_id=:par1) and 1=(select count(vss.id) from vocServiceStream vss where vss.id=:par3 and ( (vss.code in ('BUDGET','OBLIGATORYINSURANCE') and (ms.isNoOmc is null or ms.isNoOmc='0')) or (vss.code not in ('BUDGET','OBLIGATORYINSURANCE') and pl.id is not null)))
NativeVocService.join: left join WorkFunctionService wfs on wfs.medService_id=ms.id left join WorkFunction wf on case when wfs.workfunction_id is null then wf.workFunction_id=wfs.vocWorkFunction_id else wf.id=wfs.workfunction_id end left join worker w on w.id=wf.worker_id left join pricemedservice pms on pms.medservice_id=ms.id left join priceposition pp on pp.id=pms.priceposition_id left join pricelist pl on pl.id=pp.pricelist_id and pl.isDefault='1'
NativeVocService.queried: (upper(ms.code) like upper(:query) or upper(ms.code) like replace(upper(:query),'.','') or upper(ms.name) like UPPER(:query))

NativeVocService.parent: wf.id=:par1 and (ms.startDate is null or to_date(:par2,'dd.mm.yyyy') >=ms.startDate) and (ms.finishDate is null or ms.finishDate>=to_date(:par2,'dd.mm.yyyy'))
NativeVocService.queryAppend: ms.dtype='MedService' and ms.isPoliclinic='1' and pl.isDefault='1' and pp.dateto is null
NativeVocService.join: left join pricelist pl on pl.id=pp.pricelist_id left join pricemedservice pms on pms.priceposition_id=pp.id left join medservice ms on ms.id=pms.medservice_id left join WorkFunctionService wfs on wfs.medService_id=ms.id left join WorkFunction wf on case when wfs.workfunction_id is null then wf.workFunction_id=wfs.vocWorkFunction_id else wf.id=wfs.workfunction_id end
NativeVocService.queried: (upper(ms.code) like upper(:query) or upper(ms.code) like replace(upper(:query),'.','') or upper(ms.name) like UPPER(:query))

NativeVocService.parent: (ms.startDate is null or current_date >= ms.startDate ) and (ms.finishDate is null or ms.finishDate>=current_date) and 1=(select count(vss.id) from vocServiceStream vss where vss.id=:parent and ( (vss.isCalcOmcHosp='1' and (ms.isNoOmc is null or ms.isNoOmc='0')) or ((vss.isCalcOmcHosp is null or vss.isCalcOmcHosp='0') and pl.id is not null)))
NativeVocService.join: left join pricemedservice pms on pms.medservice_id=ms.id left join priceposition pp on pp.id=pms.priceposition_id and pp.dateTo is null left join pricelist pl on pl.id=pp.pricelist_id and pl.isDefault='1'
NativeVocService.queried: (upper(ms.code) like upper(:query) or upper(ms.code) like replace(upper(:query),'.','') or upper(ms.name) like UPPER(:query))

NativeVocService.parent: wf.id=:par1 and (ms.startDate is null or to_date(:par2,'dd.mm.yyyy') >=ms.startDate) and (ms.finishDate is null or ms.finishDate>=to_date(:par2,'dd.mm.yyyy')) and 1=(select count(vss.id) from vocServiceStream vss where vss.id=:par3 and ( (vss.isCalcOmcHosp='1' and (ms.isNoOmc is null or ms.isNoOmc='0')) or ((vss.isCalcOmcHosp is null or vss.isCalcOmcHosp='0') and pl.id is not null)))
NativeVocService.queryAppend: ms.dtype='MedService' and (ms.isDayHospital='1' or ms.isHospital='1') and vst.code!='OPERATION'
NativeVocService.join: left join WorkFunctionService wfs on wfs.medService_id=ms.id left join WorkFunction wf on case when wfs.workfunction_id is null then wf.workFunction_id=wfs.vocWorkFunction_id else wf.id=wfs.workfunction_id end left join vocServiceType vst on ms.servicetype_id=vst.id left join pricemedservice pms on pms.medservice_id=ms.id left join priceposition pp on pp.id=pms.priceposition_id and pp.dateTo is null left join pricelist pl on pl.id=pp.pricelist_id and pl.isDefault='1'
NativeVocService.queried: (upper(ms.code) like upper(:query) or upper(ms.code) like replace(upper(:query),'.','') or upper(ms.name) like UPPER(:query))

NativeVocService.parent: wfs.vocWorkFunction_id=:parent and (ms.startDate is null or current_date >=ms.startDate) and (ms.finishDate is null or ms.finishDate>=current_date)
NativeVocService.names: ms.code||' '||coalesce(case when ms.shortname='' then null else ms.shortname end,ms.name)
NativeVocService.join: left join WorkFunctionService wfs on wfs.medService_id=ms.id
NativeVocService.queried: (upper(ms.code) like upper(:query) or upper(ms.code) like replace(upper(:query),'.','') or upper(ms.name) like UPPER(:query) or upper(ms.shortname) like UPPER(:query))

NativeVocService.parent: m.id=:parent and (wfs.lpu_id is null or wf.dtype='PersonalWorkFunction' and wfs.lpu_id=w.lpu_id or wf.dtype='GroupWorkFunction' and wfs.lpu_id=wf.lpu_id ) and (ms.startDate is null or wcd.calendardate >=ms.startDate) and (ms.finishDate is null or ms.finishDate>=wcd.calendardate)
NativeVocService.join: left join WorkFunctionService wfs on wfs.medService_id=ms.id left join WorkFunction wf on wf.workFunction_id=wfs.vocWorkFunction_id left join medcase m on m.workFunctionPlan_id=wf.id left join WorkCalendarDay wcd on wcd.id=m.datePlan_id left join worker w on w.id=wf.worker_id
NativeVocService.queried: (upper(ms.code) like upper(:query) or upper(ms.code) like replace(upper(:query),'.','') or upper(ms.name) like UPPER(:query))

NativeVocService.join: left join Patient pat on pat.id=preg.patient_id
NativeVocService.queried: (cast(preg.id as varchar(20)) like :querId or cast(preg.orderNumber as varchar(5)) like :querId)

EntityVocService.queryAppend: parent_id is null and (isArchive is null or isArchive='0')

NativeVocService.join: left join Patient as pk on pk.id=k.kinsman_id
NativeVocService.queried: pk.lastname like UPPER(:query)

NativeVocService.join: left join Patient as pk on pk.id=k.kinsman_id left join Patient as pk1 on pk1.id=k.person_id
NativeVocService.queried: pk.lastname like UPPER(:query)
(omcCode like (:query) or name like UPPER(:query) or cast(id as varchar(20)) like (:querId))

EntityVocService.queryAppend: (deprecated is null or deprecated = false) and (isRegion=true)

NativeVocService.queried: (vpwi.code like :querId or vpwi.name like :query)
(vpbp.name like :query)
(to_char(wcd.calendarDate,'DD.MM.YYYY') like :query )
NativeVocService.join: left join WorkCalendar as wc on wc.id=wcd.workCalendar_id

NativeVocService.queried: (dd.number like :query )
NativeVocService.join: left join DisabilityCase dc on dc.id=dd.disabilityCase_id

NativeVocService.parent: wct.workCalendarDay_id = :par1 and ((mc.patient_id= :par2 and mc.dateStart is null) or ( wct.medCase_id is null and wct.prescription is null and wct.prepatient_id is null and (wct.prepatientinfo is null or wct.prepatientinfo='') and vsrt.id is null))
NativeVocService.queried: (cast(wct.timeFrom as varchar(5)) like :query )
NativeVocService.join: left join VocServiceReserveType vsrt on vsrt.id=wct.reserveType_id left join MedCase mc on mc.id=wct.medCase_id

NativeVocService.queried: (cast(wct.timeFrom as varchar(5)) like :query )
NativeVocService.queryAppend: wct.medCase_id is null and wct.prescription is null and wct.prepatient_id is null and (wct.prepatientinfo is null or wct.prepatientinfo='') and vsrt.id is null and (wct.isDeleted is null or wct.isDeleted='0')
NativeVocService.join: left join VocServiceReserveType vsrt on vsrt.id=wct.reserveType_id

NativeVocService.queried: (cast(wct.timeFrom as varchar(5)) like :query )
NativeVocService.queryAppend: wct.medCase_id is null and wct.prescription is null and wct.prepatient_id is null and (wct.prepatientinfo is null or wct.prepatientinfo='') and (wct.isDeleted is null or wct.isDeleted='0')
NativeVocService.join: left join WorkCalendarDay wcd on wcd.id=wct.workCalendarDay_id left join WorkCalendar wc on wc.id=wcd.workCalendar_id

NativeVocService.queried: (cast(wf.id as varchar(20))= :querId or vwf.name like UPPER(:query) or p.lastname like UPPER(:query) )
NativeVocService.queryAppend: smc.dtype='PolyclinicMedCase' and smc.dateFinish is not null
NativeVocService.join: left join WorkFunction wf on wf.id=smc.ownerFunction_id left join Worker as w on w.id=wf.worker_id left join Patient as p on p.id=w.person_id left join VocWorkFunction vwf on vwf.id=wf.workFunction_id

NativeVocService.queried: (cast(wf.id as varchar(20))= :querId or vwf.name like UPPER(:query) or p.lastname like UPPER(:query) )
NativeVocService.join: left join WorkFunction wf on wf.id=smc.ownerFunction_id left join Worker as w on w.id=wf.worker_id left join Patient as p on p.id=w.person_id left join VocWorkFunction vwf on vwf.id=wf.workFunction_id

NativeVocService.names: vwf.name||' '|| p.lastname||' '||p.firstname||' '||p.middlename ||' ' ||case when wf.dtype='PersonalWorkFunction' then ml2.name else ml1.name end
NativeVocService.queried: (cast(wf.id as varchar(20))= :querInd or upper(vwf.name) like UPPER(:query) or (upper(p.lastname) like upper(:quer1) and (:quer2 is null or upper(p.firstname) like upper(:quer2)) and (:quer3 is null or upper(p.middlename) like upper(:quer3))) )
NativeVocService.queryAppend: wf.dtype='PersonalWorkFunction' and (wf.archival is null or wf.archival='0')
NativeVocService.join:
left join Worker as w on w.id=wf.worker_id left join MisLpu ml1 on ml1.id=wf.lpu_id left join MisLpu ml2 on ml2.id=w.lpu_id
left join Patient as p on p.id=w.person_id left join VocWorkFunction vwf on vwf.id=wf.workFunction_id

NativeVocService.queried: (cast(wf.id as varchar(20))= :querInd or upper(vwf.name) like UPPER(:query) )
NativeVocService.queryAppend: wf.dtype='GroupWorkFunction' and (wf.archival is null or wf.archival='0') and (vwf.isfuncdiag is null or vwf.isfuncdiag='0') and (vwf.islab is null or vwf.islab='0') and (vwf.isradiationdiagnosis is null or vwf.isradiationdiagnosis='0') and vlf.code='3'
NativeVocService.join: left join VocWorkFunction vwf on vwf.id=wf.workFunction_id left join MisLpu ml on ml.id=wf.lpu_id left join VocLpuFunction vlf on vlf.id=ml.lpuFunction_id

NativeVocService.names: vwf.name||' '|| p.lastname||' '||p.firstname||' '||p.middlename ||' ' ||case when wf.dtype='PersonalWorkFunction' then ml2.name else ml1.name end
NativeVocService.queried: (cast(wf.id as varchar(20))= :querInd or upper(vwf.name) like UPPER(:query) or (upper(p.lastname) like upper(:quer1) and (:quer2 is null or upper(p.firstname) like upper(:quer2)) and (:quer3 is null or upper(p.middlename) like upper(:quer3))) )
NativeVocService.join:
left join Worker as w on w.id=wf.worker_id left join MisLpu ml1 on ml1.id=wf.lpu_id left join MisLpu ml2 on ml2.id=w.lpu_id
left join Patient as p on p.id=w.person_id left join VocWorkFunction vwf on vwf.id=wf.workFunction_id

NativeVocService.names: vwf.name||' '||case when w.person_id is null then wf.groupName||' ('||mlGr.name||')' else p.lastname||' '||p.firstname||' '||p.middlename||' ('||mlW.name||')' end
NativeVocService.queried: (cast(wf.id as varchar(20)) = :querInd or vwf.name like UPPER(:query) or p.lastname like UPPER(:query) or wf.groupName like UPPER(:query) )
NativeVocService.queryAppend: wc.id is not null and wf.group_id is null and (wf.archival is null or wf.archival='0')
NativeVocService.join: left join Worker as w on w.id=wf.worker_id left join Patient as p on p.id=w.person_id inner join VocWorkFunction vwf on vwf.id=wf.workFunction_id left join WorkCalendar wc on wc.workFunction_id=wf.id left join mislpu mlGr on mlGr.id=wf.lpu_id left join mislpu mlW on mlW.id=w.lpu_id

NativeVocService.parent: (select m.id from medcard as m where m.id=:parent and (m.lpu_id is null or w.lpu_id=m.lpu_id))>0
NativeVocService.queried: (cast(wf.id as varchar(6)) like :querId or wf.code like :querId or p.lastname like UPPER(:query))
NativeVocService.queryAppend: wf.DTYPE ='PersonalWorkFunction' and (wf.archival is null or wf.archival='0')
NativeVocService.join: left join Worker as w on w.id=wf.worker_id left join Patient as p on p.id=w.person_id left join VocWorkFunction vwf on vwf.id=wf.workFunction_id left join MisLpu ml on ml.id=w.lpu_id

NativeVocService.names: case when wf.code is null then '' else wf.code||' ' end || vwf.name||' '|| p.lastname||' '||p.firstname||' '||p.middlename
NativeVocService.queried: (cast(wf.id as varchar(10)) like :querId or wf.code like :querId or p.lastname like UPPER(:query))
NativeVocService.queryAppend: wf.DTYPE ='PersonalWorkFunction' and (wf.archival is null or cast(wf.archival as integer)=0)
NativeVocService.join: left join Worker as w on w.id=wf.worker_id left join Patient as p on p.id=w.person_id inner join VocWorkFunction vwf on vwf.id=wf.workFunction_id

NativeVocService.names: case when wf.code is null then '' else wf.code||' ' end || vwf.name||' '|| p.lastname||' '||p.firstname||' '||p.middlename
NativeVocService.queried: (cast(wf.id as varchar(10)) like :querId or wf.code like :querId or p.lastname like UPPER(:query))
NativeVocService.queryAppend: wf.DTYPE ='PersonalWorkFunction' and (wf.archival is null or wf.archival='0') and (wf.isSurgical='1')
NativeVocService.join: left join Worker as w on w.id=wf.worker_id left join Patient as p on p.id=w.person_id inner join VocWorkFunction vwf on vwf.id=wf.workFunction_id

NativeVocService.names: case when wf.code is null then '' else wf.code||' ' end || vwf.name||' '|| p.lastname||' '||p.firstname||' '||p.middlename
NativeVocService.queried: (cast(wf.id as varchar(10)) like :querId or wf.code like :querId or p.lastname like UPPER(:query))
NativeVocService.queryAppend: wf.DTYPE ='PersonalWorkFunction' and (wf.archival is null or wf.archival='0') and (wf.isInstrumentNurse='1')
NativeVocService.join: left join Worker as w on w.id=wf.worker_id left join Patient as p on p.id=w.person_id inner join VocWorkFunction vwf on vwf.id=wf.workFunction_id

NativeVocService.queried: m.number like UPPER(:query)

NativeVocService.names: pcc.cardNumber ||' '|| coalesce((select vpac.code||' '||to_char(po.startDate,'dd.mm.yyyy') from PsychiaticObservation po left join VocPsychAmbulatoryCare vpac on vpac.id=po.ambulatoryCare_id where po.carecard_id=pcc.id having po.startDate=max(po.startDate)),'-')
NativeVocService.queried: pcc.cardNumber like UPPER(:query)

NativeVocService.join: left join suicidemessage sm on sm.patient_id=pcc.patient_id
NativeVocService.queried: pcc.cardNumber like UPPER(:query)
(wf.id like :query or p.lastname like UPPER(:query))
NativeVocService.queryAppend: wf.DTYPE ='PersonalWorkFunction' and (wf.archival is null or cast(wf.archival as integer)=0)
NativeVocService.join: left join WorkFunction wf1 on wf1.worker_id=wf.worker_id left join SecUser su on su.id=wf1.secuser_id left join Worker as w on w.id=wf.worker_id left join Patient as p on p.id=w.person_id inner join VocWorkFunction vwf on vwf.id=wf.workFunction_id
left join Omc_KodTer as okt on oss.smocode like okt.voc_code||'%'
NativeVocService.queryAppend: oss.smoCode is not null and oss.finishDate is null
NativeVocService.queried: oss.name like UPPER(:query)

NativeVocService.names: case when smo.dtype='POLYCLINICMEDCASE' then 'СПО: '||smo.id when smo.dtype='HOSPITALMEDCASE' and smo.statisticstub_id is not null then 'СЛС: '||ss.code else 'СЛС: нет №стат.карты' end || ' ' || p.lastname||' '||p.firstname||' '||p.middlename
NativeVocService.queried: ss.code like :query or smo.id like :query or p.lastname like upper(:query) or (p.lastname like $piece(upper(:query),' ',1)||'%' and (p.firstname like $piece(upper(:query),' ',2)||'%' or $piece(upper(:query),' ',2) is null) and (p.middlename like $piece(upper(:query),' ',3)||'%' or $piece(:query,' ',3) is null))
NativeVocService.join: left join statisticstub ss on smo.statisticstub_id=ss.id left join patient p on p.id=smo.patient_id

NativeVocService.queried: upper(dep.name) like upper(:query)
NativeVocService.join: left join MisLpu dep on smoD.department_id=dep.id left join workfunction wf on wf.id=smoD.ownerFunction_id left join VocWorkfunction vwf on vwf.id=wf.workFunction_id left join worker w on w.id=wf.worker_id left join patient wp on wp.id=w.person_id

NativeVocService.queried: upper(dep.name) like upper(:query)
NativeVocService.join: left join medcase smoD on smoD.department_id =dep.id and smoD.DTYPE='DepartmentMedCase'

NativeVocService.queried: upper(dep.name) like upper(:query)
codeF like :querId or UPPER(name) like UPPER(:query)
NativeVocService.queryAppend: (disable is null or cast(disable as int)=0)

NativeVocService.queried: code like :querId or UPPER(name) like UPPER(:query)
upper(vb.branch) like upper(:query)
upper(vb.name) like upper(:query)
upper(vc.name) like upper(:query)

NativeVocService.join: left join voccoloridentitypatient vcip on vcip.color_id=vc.id
NativeVocService.queried: upper(vc.name) like upper(:query)

NativeVocService.join: left join voccolor vc on vcip.color_id=vc.id
NativeVocService.queried: upper(vc.name||' ('||vcip.name||')') like upper(:query)

NativeVocService.join: left join voccolor vc on vcip.color_id=vc.id
NativeVocService.queried: upper(vc.name||' ('||vcip.name||')') like upper(:query)
name
upper(voc.cod||' ('||voc.name||')') like upper(:query)
upper(voc.code||' ('||voc.name||')') like upper(:query)
